word_mean: 顺势疗法：Samuel Hahnemann(1755-1843)创立的一种医疗方法，即以能使健康者产生类似待治疾病的症状的药物进行治疗，药物须用小剂量。参见allopathy

sentence.Network_en: Most doctors appear to recognize homeopathy as a legitimate form of medicine.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数医生似乎都接受顺势疗法是一种合理的医疗手段。

sentence.Network_en: Market in 2008 was in swing in 2009, perhaps out of homeopathy.
sentence.Network_cn: 2008年创业板曾经如箭在弦,2009年也许顺势而出.

sentence.Network_en: Homeopathy is a popular form of medicine.
sentence.Network_cn: 顺势疗法是一种流行的非正统疗法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: coined in German from Greek homoios 'like' + patheia (see -pathy)

entry.def: Homeopathy is a way of treating an illness in which the patient is given very small amounts of a drug that produces signs of the illness in healthy people.

means.word_mean: 1. a method of treating disease with small amounts of remedies that, in large amounts in healthy people, produce symptoms similar to those being treated

auth_sentence.content: Homeopathy has failed to produce even one verifiable cure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Homeopathy has failed to produce even one verifiable cure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Homeopathy has failed to produce even one verifiable cure.

auth_sentence.content: It's because homeopathy does nothing it doesn't work.

stems_affixes.word_buile: homo同类的+centric中心的→adj.同中心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 单色的, 只有单色的
stems_affixes.word_buile: homo同类的+chrom颜色+atic表形容词→颜色一样的→单色的
homo同类的+gen产生+eous……的→产生相同的
homo同类的+sexual性别的→adj.同性恋的;n.同性恋
homeo=homo同类的+path病+y→顺着病相同的方面治疗

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同音异义字, 同名异物
stems_affixes.word_buile: homo同类的+onym名字→homonym名字相同,意义不同
homo同类的+sexual性别的→adj.同性恋的;n.同性恋
homo同类的+gen产生+ize表动词→产生一致→使一致
